# CTO Communication Templates

## 1. Technology Strategy Deck (Structure)

- **Executive Summary**: Vision on one slide.
- **Current Assessment**: Debt, velocity, and stack state.
- **Vision & Roadmap**: 3-5 year goal + quarterly milestones.
- **Investment Required**: Budget and headcount changes.
- **Risks & Mitigation**: Critical blockers.

## 2. Engineering All-Hands (Agenda)

- **Wins & Recognition** (5 min): Celebrate ships and behavior.
- **Metrics Review** (5 min): Transpareny on DORA/Quality.
- **Strategic Updates** (10 min): Connect daily work to big goals.
- **Micro-Demo** (15 min): Engineer-led deep dive into a feature.
- **Ask Me Anything (AMA)** (10 min): Open floor.

## 3. Executive/Board Update (Email)

```
Subject: Engineering Update - [Month]

Highlights:
• [Achievement]
• [Metric delta, e.g., Deploy frequency increased 20%]

Challenges:
• [Blocker and mitigation plan]

Next Month Priorities:
• [Goal 1]
• [Goal 2]
```
